channel.title: 11. Service Packages on
channel.description: Recent content in 11. Service Packages on

item.title: 11.1 Terms
item.description: Terms used # Point # Is the unit used for the activities of providing and maintaining software services on the GPS GoTrack platform. Each account is given a wallet containing the number of Points it owns. Device # Are hardware devices connected to the GoTrack platform for management, monitoring and tracking. These devices can be either a Black Box or a Camera. Bike Service Package #

item.title: 11.3 Transaction Point
item.description: Add Point # This transaction is used to import Points into the platform. ❗ Only authorized accounts can make this transaction. Sell / Transfer Point # This transaction is used to sell or move some amount of points from one account to the other. All steps as follows: Go to your Business page Select the Point tab Click the Sell | Move Button Enter the information on the form Press Save changes to proceed ❗ Note:

item.title: 11.2 Packages
item.description: Service Pack # Package name Service term Storage term Renewal Points New extra points Number of Cameras Term of trial service Describe Bike 12month 3month 20 20 0 0 - Management and supervision of motorbikes - Remotely turn on/off the device via the app - 3 months itinerary archive Car 12month 12month 30 30 0 0 - Manage and monitor cars, meet QCVN31, ND10

item.title: 11.4 Transaction Device
item.description: Device Transaction # It is a transaction of adding new deivces to the Platform. Currently there are 3 new types of additions as follows: Type Description Yearly After selecting the Point package, it will be deducted immediately The system automactically activate after 8 hours of continuos online device Option Deduct points according to the total of months corresponding to the Package

item.title: 11.6 FAQ
item.description: 1. Why is the device unable to add ? # Please check the following factors: Your account has the right to add device Sufficient Points Balance to add a Device with the corresponding Package 2. Why is the device unable to renew ? # Please check the following factors: Your account has the right to renew the device Sufficient Points Balance to renew a Device with the corresponding Package
